translations: 有节制的（sober 的比较级）
头脑清醒的（sober 的比较级）

sentences.sentence: She knew he was so drunk, but she was soberer than any time.
sentences.translation: 她知道他是醉了，但她却比任何时候都要清醒。

sentences.sentence: For in spite of being happier than I ever dreamed I could be, I'm also 2 soberer.
sentences.translation: 尽管得到了超越梦想般的快乐，我也变得更沉郁。

sentences.sentence: Hope so stationmaster people a bit soberer, did not let Internet destroy his career!
sentences.translation: 所以希望站长们更清醒一点，不要让互联网毁了自己的前程！
